name: Demilitarized Zone
effect: Return all structures on this planet to your reinforcements . Then, return all ground forces on this planet to the space area . ATTACH : Units cannot be committed to, produced on or placed on this planet. During the agenda phase , this planet's planet card can be traded as part of a transaction .

name: Dyson Sphere
effect: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 2 and its influence value is increased by 1.

name: Freelancers
effect: You may produce 1 unit in this system; you may spend influence as if it were resources to produce this unit.

name: Gamma Wormhole
effect: Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.

name: Mercenary Outfit
effect: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on this planet.

name: Paradise World
effect: ATTACH: This planet's influence value is increased by 2.

name: Tomb of Emphidia
effect: ATTACH : This planet's influence value is increased by 1. : If the player who has the "Crown of Emphidia" Relic has control of this planet, they can use that relic to gain 1 Victory Point.

name: Cultural Relic Fragment
effect: ACTION: Purge 3 of your cultural relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

name: Abandoned Warehouses
effect: You may gain 2 commodities , or you may convert up to 2 of your commodities to trade goods.

name: Biotic Research Facility
effect: ATTACH: This planet has a green technology specialty ; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

name: Cybernetic Research Facility
effect: ATTACH : This planet has a yellow technology specialty ; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

name: Functioning Base
effect: You may gain 1 commodity , or you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to draw 1 action card .

name: Local Fabricators
effect: You may gain 1 commodity , or you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on this planet.

name: Propulsion Research Facility
effect: ATTACH : This planet has a blue technology specialty ; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

name: Industrial Relic Fragment
effect: ACTION: Purge 3 of your industrial relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

name: Core Mine
effect: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, gain 1 trade good .

name: Expedition
effect: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, ready this planet.

name: Lazax Survivors
effect: ATTACH : This planet's resource value is increased by 1 and its influence value is increased by 2.

name: Mining World
effect: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 2.

name: Rich World
effect: ATTACH : This planet's resource value is increased by 1.

name: Volatile Fuel Source
effect: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry from this planet, gain 1 command token .

name: Warfare Research Facility
effect: ATTACH : This planet has a red technology specialty ; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

name: Hazardous Relic Fragment
effect: ACTION: Purge 3 of your hazardous relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

name: Derelict Vessel
effect: Draw 1 secret objective .

name: Enigmatic Device
effect: Place this card face up in your play area. ACTION: You may spend 6 resources and purge this card to research 1 technology .

name: Gamma Relay
effect: Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.

name: Ion Storm
effect: Place the ion storm token in this system with either side face up. Then, place this card in the common play area. At the end of a "Move Ships" or "Retreat" sub-step of a tactical action during which 1 or more of your ships use the ion storm wormhole, flip the ion storm token to its opposing side.

name: Lost Crew
effect: Draw 2 Action Cards .

name: Merchant Station
effect: You may replenish your commodities , or you may convert your commodities to trade goods.

name: Mirage
effect: Place the Mirage planet token in this system. Gain the Mirage planet card and ready it. Then, purge this card.

name: Unknown Relic Fragment
effect: This card counts as a relic fragment of any type.

name: Dead World
effect: Draw 1 relic.

name: Entropic Field
effect: Gain 1 command token and 2 trade goods.

name: Keleres Ship
effect: Gain 2 command tokens.

name: Major Entropic Field
effect: Gain 1 command token and 3 trade goods.

name: Minor Entropic Field
effect: Gain 1 command token and 1 trade good.

name: Dominus Orb
effect: Before you move units during a tactical action , you may purge this card to move and transport units that are in systems that contain 1 of your command tokens .

name: Maw of Worlds
effect: At the start of the agenda phase , you may purge this card and exhaust all of your planets to gain any 1 technology .

name: Scepter of Emelpar
effect: When you would spend a token from your strategy pool , you may exhaust this card to spend a token from your reinforcements instead.

name: Shard of the Throne
effect: When you gain this card, gain 1 victory point. When you lose this card, lose 1 victory point. When a player gains control of a legendary planet you control, or a planet you control in your home system , that player gains this card.

name: Stellar Converter
effect: ACTION: Choose 1 non- home , non- legendary planet other than Mecatol Rex in a system that is adjacent to 1 or more of your units that have BOMBARDMENT ; destroy all units on that planet and purge its attachments and its planet card. Then, place the destroyed planet token on that planet and purge this card.

name: The Codex
effect: ACTION: Purge this card to take up to 3 action cards of your choice from the action card discard pile.

name: The Crown of Emphidia
effect: After you perform a tactical action , you may exhaust this card to explore 1 planet you control At the end of the status phase , if you control the "Tomb of Emphidia" , you may purge this card to gain 1 Victory Point.

name: The Crown of Thalnos
effect: During each combat round, this card's owner may reroll any number of their dice, applying +1 to the results; any units that reroll dice but do not produce at least 1 hit are destroyed.

name: The Obsidian
effect: When you gain this card, draw 1 secret objective . You can have 1 additional scored or unscored secret objective.

name: The Prophet's Tears
effect: When you research a technology , you may exhaust this card to ignore 1 prerequisite or draw 1 action card .

name: Dynamis Core
effect: While this card is in your play area, your commodity value is increased by 2. ACTION: Purge this card to gain trade goods equal to your printed commodity value +2.

name: Dynamis Core
effect: While this card is in your play area, your commodity value is increased by 2. ACTION: Gain trade goods equal to your commodity value then purge this card.

name: JR-XS455-0
effect: ACTION: Exhaust this agent and choose a player; that player may spend 3 resources to place a structure on a planet they control. If they do not, they gain 1 trade good .

name: Nano-Forge
effect: ACTION: Attach this card to a non- legendary , non- home planet you control; its resource and influence values are increased by 2 and it is a legendary planet.

name: Nano-Forge
effect: ACTION: Attach this card to a non- legendary , non- home planet you control; its resource and influence values are increased by 2 and it is a legendary planet. This action cannot be performed once attached.

name: Circlet of the Void
effect: Your units do not roll for gravity rifts , and you ignore the movement effects of other anomalies . ACTION: Exhaust this card to explore a frontier token in a system that does not contain any other players' ships.

name: Book of Latvinia
effect: When you gain this card, research up to 2 technologies that have no prerequisites. ACTION: Purge this card; if you control planets that have all 4 types of technology specialties , gain 1 victory point. Otherwise, gain the speaker token.

name: Neuraloop
effect: When a public objective is revealed, you may purge one of your relics to discard that objective and replace it with a random objective from any objective deck; that objective is a public objective, even if it is a secret objective.

name: Metali Void Armaments
effect: During the "Anti Fighter Barrage" step of space combat, you may resolve ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 6 (X3) against your opponent's units.

name: The Quantumcore
effect: When you gain this card, gain your breakthrough. You have SYNERGY for all technology types.

name: The Silver Flame
effect: The Silver Flame may be exchanged as part of a transaction. ACTION: Roll 1 die and purge this card; if the result is a 10, gain 1 victory point. Otherwise, purge your home system and all units in it; you cannot score public objectives. Put the Fracture into play if it is not already.

name: Lightrail Ordnance
effect: Your space docks gain SPACE CANNON 5 (X2). You may use your space dock's SPACE CANNON against ships that are adjacent to their system.

name: Metali Void Shielding
effect: Each time hits are produced against 1 of your non-fighter ships, 1 of those ships may use SUSTAIN DAMAGE as if it had that ability.

name: The Triad
effect: This card can be readied and spent as if it were a planet card. Its resource and influence values are equal to 3 plus the number of different types of relic fragments you own.

name: Heart of Ixth
effect: After any die is rolled, you may exhaust this card to add or subtract 1 from its results.
